text: Berla Mundi: TV3 Presenter Looks Glamorous In A Classy Customised Gown For Her Private Wedding - Television personality Berla Mundi wants to break the internet with her fabulous outfit for her traditional wedding - The beauty goddess looked ethereal in a stunning kente outfit and beautiful hairstyle for the private event - Some social media users have commented on Berla Mundi's elegant wedding photos PAY ATTENTION: [YEN Entertainment Awards 2023 VOTING is officially underway!](https://corp.yen.com.gh/yen-awards#) Ghanaian media personality [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/tags/berla-mundi/) has tied the knot in a breathtaking ensemble with a few celebrities, family and friends in attendance. The TV3 presenter looked charming in a custom-made outfit that made her glow for her private ceremony on January 5, 2024. Berla Mundi has inspired many women planning to walk down the aisle in 2024 with her elegant bridal hairstyle and flawless makeup as she recited her marital vows. Check out [Giovani Caleb](https://twitter.com/GiovaniCaleb/status/1743317745008042340)'s tweet below; Berla Mundi slays in a shiny, ruched dress The Day Show host Berla Mundi looked gorgeous in a two-tone dress and frontal curly hairstyle as she interviewed exceptional Ghanaians doing amazing things in different industries. Check out the [photos](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1h1ludoORX/?img_index=1) below; Berla Mundi Rocks Kira jacket And Bubble Skirt, Resembles Jordin Sparks In New Photos Earlier, YEN.com.gh wrote about [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/style/243729-berla-mundi-tv3-presenter-rocks-kira-jacket-bubble-skirt-resembles-jordin-sparks-photos/)'s elegant outfit for her new photoshoot. The morning show presenter donned a showy silky skirt and a black blazer with distinctive embroidery. Some female style influencers like Anita Akuffo, Lydia Forson, and Selly Galley have commented on Berla Mundi's post. Berla Mundi Goes Viral As She Flaunts Her Cleavage In A Shiny Flared Gown With Hoodie To Host Event Previously, YEN.com.gh wrote about [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/style/232964-2023-vgma-berla-mundi-rocks-a-shiny-flared-gown-hoodie-hosts-music-award-fourth-time/), one of the most gifted media figures and event presenters. The fashion influencer attended the largest music festival, honouring exceptional musicians with immaculate makeup.
